member.summary: Html to PDF document converter

member.summary: Generate PDF by specfied HTML content and prepend cover page (useful with GenerateToc option)

first page HTML (optional, can be null)

first page HTML (optional, can be null)

member.name: M:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.GeneratePdfFromFile(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generate PDF by specfied HTML content and prepend cover page (useful with GenerateToc option)
member.param: path to HTML file or absolute URL
first page HTML (optional, can be null)
path to output PDF file (if file already exists it will be removed before PDF generation)

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.PdfToolPath
member.summary: Get or set path where WkHtmlToPdf tool is located
member.remarks: By default this property points to the folder where application assemblies are located. If WkHtmlToPdf tool files are not present PdfConverter expands them from DLL resources.

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.WkHtmlToPdfExeName
member.summary: Get or set WkHtmlToPdf tool EXE file name ('wkhtmltopdf.exe' by default)

member.summary: Get or set PDF page orientation

member.summary: Get or set PDF page orientation

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.LowQuality
member.summary: Get or set option to generate low quality PDF (shrink the result document space)

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.Grayscale
member.summary: Get or set option to generate grayscale PDF

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.ExecutionTimeout

member.summary: Occurs when log line is received from WkHtmlToPdf process
member.remarks: Quiet mode should be disabled if you want to get wkhtmltopdf info/debug messages

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.Quiet
member.summary: Suppress wkhtmltopdf debug/info log messages (by default is true)
